thread.title: Watch These Firefighters Carry Bundles Of Piglets Out Of A Burning Barn
thread.title_full: Watch These Firefighters Carry Bundles Of Piglets Out Of A Burning Barn - BuzzFeed News

author: Jason Wells
title: Watch These Firefighters Carry Bundles Of Piglets Out Of A Burning Barn
text:
View this image ›
AP ID: 10373557 2. Here’s a firefighter carrying two piglets. View this image ›
AP ID: 10373561 3. Here’s a firefighter carrying a bundle of piglets. View this image ›
AP ID: 10373567 4. Here’s a little piggy getting tossed. View this image ›
AP ID: 10373573 5. And here’s a firefighter herding a bunch of little pigs in the snow. View this image ›
AP ID: 10373591 6. Despite the mass rescue, an estimated 50 pigs reportedly didn’t make it out of the fire that broke out Friday in the Chernaya Rechka village outside the Siberian city of Tomsk. ID: 10373602 7. RIP, piggies. ID: 10373632 8. Watch the full video of the rescue operation here: Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=LWyz5cbf4IY . youtube.com ID: 10373606 9.
